borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development are considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area.</p><p>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);<br>- Policies 7.1, 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of The London Plan (March 2016); <br>- Policy D1, D4 and HC1 of the Draft London Plan Intended to Publish (December 2019); <br>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010); <br>- Policies BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);<br>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012); <br>- Policies SP4, DM11, DM14 and DM16 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 18 Consultation version, November 2019).</p>

<p>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in an unacceptable loss of outlook, daylight, sense of overbearing and enclosure to No.121 Heathway and an unacceptable loss of outlook to No.117 Heathway. This therefore would cause harm to neighbouring occupiers, constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:</p><p>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011).<br>-&nbsp;<span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">Policy DM16 of the&nbsp;</span><font face="Calibri, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">Draft&nbsp;</span></font><span style="font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">Local Plan (Regulation 18 Consultation version, November 2019).<br></span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">- The Residential&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;">Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);</span></p>
description: Construction of a first floor rear extension.
